DialogueBox.TextBody: Hey guys, I'm done here, I'm leaving.
World Star!
You didn't even try to get to know me.
Awe, c'mon, don't you want a taste of this Latin flair?
Aye que trapo tan fea.
I’m sorry to break it to you but having Colombian friends doesn’t make you Hispanic, mama.
Where you goin, mi hermano’s talking to you.
Oh, don’t be like that
Trust me... You didn’t
The white girl knows a little Spanish and think she’s all that.
What are you doing in this corner at this time at night.
This is the hottest garbage I have ever heard. Why did you bother doing this?
We will be taking your greatest hit making looze dollaz change again
What would you like missy?

Yeah, Their just feeling some type of way because the other day, their friends had to watch their favorite corner store from around the block turn into a starbucks right in front of their faces! This area is under gentrification, So I think they're just a little bit on edge.
Hey, your sandwich is ready, that will be $4.50 please, but for you, it’s on the house, enjoy!
Hey bastard! Why are you messaging me again even after we were through, I thought i told you to delete my number! Do it now! This the last time i’ll say this!
Bruh you would have thought, you already had a chance, you're disgusting!
And that’s why you stayed living at your frapper’s house you hideous pendejo, you're nothing but a moocher in desperate need of a life! Bye!
Dang they're so worried about me, I’ll let them know that I’m on my way home.
Sorry about that, there’s a lot of people out here tonight
Pfft! You could be Obama and I wouldn’t give a fuck. It’s called manners and I’m sorry your mom didn’t know how to raise you with any
You outta what? I wish you would try to hit me, you saw what happened to Chris Brown
Wow what an asshole, this is why I hate apologizing ughh!
My bad I didn’t i think I may have had one too many drinks!
How dare this bastard message me again! I’m gonna call him and give him a piece of my mind!
It’s not like I’m 15 years old, why can’t they see that I’m trying to live my life without being bugged! It’s not like I want to stay at their place forever.
What the fuck man! It’s LA, are you not used to being on packed street? Get outta here with all that nonsense!
Awww.. what a gentlemen you are.
Ok... bye now.
Fuck you, you Jabba the Hutt-lookin-virgin-pimple-faced fuck. How dare you?!
Definitely, I finally taught that sleazebag Sandler a well deserved lesson.
Ehh...the gym was half dead. Strangler’s lucky he’s alive, everyone's still a whole bunch of judgmental assholes, and Jason aged just as good as Macaulay Culkin...I'd say the night was wonderful

Are you for real, Ernie? How could you even ask that, the night was terrible, the reunion was a bust everyone was so self centered and obnoxious and not to mention Jason going from looking like a young Johnny Depp to an adult Macaulay Culkin.
Whatever, I’m over him anyway. And Strangler’s lucky I didn’t beat smash his family jewels right there and then!
To be honest everybody in that school were assholes anyways, I’m just glad we made it out of there on time
Come on Ernie, is that even a question? You already know my go to drink. A tequila sunrise with a slice of lemon and a cherry on top.
I think I’m gonna pass tonight. I’ve been living this sober life and it’s been going swell so far.
No that's okay, I'm pretty hungry and want to get a chopped cheese. Plus I'm not along your route anyway.

I just learned about it from some guy who took me on a date a few months ago, he was from New York. Apparently they're really popular over there, you get them at the bodega. It's basically a hamburger but the patty is chopped up and it's served on a roll or hero instead of a burger bun. The guy ended up being a piece of shit but I am forever grateful to him for putting me on.
Another thing of him that's stuck on me. It's New York slang for teaching someone something.
Fine! Leave! I don't give two fucks!
Why’d you even choose to work here? You know this has been our favorite chill spot. You just had to come and fuck it up!
Actually you're right. But still, I'm sure you know how dramatic Leani gets.
Drinks on you?
Oh shut up.
But yeah I’ll take a tequila sunrise with a slice of lemon and a cherry on top, make it snappy!
But I’m gonna pass tonight, I’ve been living this sober life and it’s been going really great, I wouldn’t want to ruin a good thing.
Wow you’re such an asshole, how did Leani ever date you!
I’m getting a little hungry, I'm in the mood for chopped cheese, I think I’m gonna head out.
You got yourself a deal!
I’m a little more classy than just some henny you know this.
What a bunch of assholes.
Not interested.
That’s cause I don’t want to get to know you.
Byee.
Who does he think he’s talking to like that?
Oh trust me, No thanks, I get enough of that from my mom.
Pa fuera, cosa viejo.
I know I’m not, nice try though.
Soy Colombiano, estupida.
Debe ser triste saber que su madre nunca te amó,
Must be sad knowing your mother never loved you.
Hello? Can I make an order please?
Alright, can I get a chopped cheese sandwich please?
ehy que lo que! Que te pasaaaaa. Mira hombre, Te voy a dar tremenda galleta si no te callas la boca!
So that you guys can always trust this place to get favorite Arizona!
Wow gracias hermano, I really hope this place doesn’t go down! Goodbye!
Just ignore them Diana, they are just being obnoxious, They can just go choke on a churro!
Que me llamaste?! Why you guys throwing shade from that dank ass corner over there!
What are you people talking about! I’m just trying to order a sandwich!
Damn, I didn’t even know that was happening...
I am so hungry.
Whatever! Alright fine, Pendejos, Yo me voy!
Please rethink your decision, this is not something you want to do.
Well just like the artist you named, you have to continue what you are doing and hone your craft. I know you will make it to the top.
Poor guy.
My name is Diana by the way.
I don't think that's something you want to do.
I see that you're having a rough day. I'll gladly get you something to eat so you can probably get your mind off things.
I have no problem doing this, since I don't want see you suffer like this. One day your dream will come true, just keep at it and in no time you could see billboard charts.

I would like to but I really have to head home because these corns on my feet is starting to create popcorn and I need to rest. Don't worry the opportunity will come with hard work and dedication, I believe you can make it.
Now that’s the spirit. Enjoy your meal and have a great day.
Nice to meet you Jo.
You're tired you need to rest so you can get a job and find other ways to help people like him.
I wish I can follow my own advice...

I would like to go home and relax these corns off my feet. I do not want to see a dream wasted just because it did not come true the first try, if it is your thing, go as far as your mind can take you. If not then at least you know you did not give up on what you wanted.
Just because I’m Spanish. These putas.
Hey those two people in the background look so familiar... isn’t that, that hobo I met last night? I think his name was Jo. Oh man, that was him getting racial profiled.
Wow that's what I heard about from yesterday, aw man Hobo Jo...
Great night we're having, huh?
Macaulay Culkin? That’s foul, even coming from you.
Seriously, I don't even know how that pervert is still working there, he's been terrorizing little high school girls for over a decade, it’s ridiculous.
You know what? Let’s celebrate! Drinks on me!
I’m already one step ahead of you.
Who the hell are you kidding? I saw you on Snapchat with a bottle of Henny two days ago talkin’ about “I could do Hennything!" But whatever you say, St. Diana.
Alright, want me to give you a lift home? It’s getting a lil'late.
What’s a chopped cheese?
What's putting on?
Ooh okay, but that chopped cheese actually does sound pretty good I’ll try one some time, but not today I got things to get ready for tomorrow. Get home safe, text me, let me know that you got in ok.
Wow... I wasn’t having the greatest night either but you don’t see me being a stuck up bitch about it. Find your own way home.
I didn’t know there was a first, what happened to that? I know we had some problems before but I’m sure we can work it out girl.
Come on babe, I got this bowl of ice cream right here but I’m trying to eat something else too...if you know what I'm saying.

I got a limo outside I know you want a joyride for the night. That bus is really cold and it smells like moth balls. The limo's got heated seats and patent leather made from alpaca that was imported from Dubai. Let's not get started on the sound system it's so amazing that George Lucas would call me king. When you get inside there a nice bottle of Ace of Spades. Oh I forgot to tell you that your eyes remind me of my car headlights. So bright, big and beautiful.
Money is no option when it comes to you my caliente latin lover.
Well fine! I don't even want you anyway why would want a broke bitch who can't see the best option of her life. When I look at Amira I am a camp site and I’m ready to pitch a tent.
The keys are in the car and we can ride all night. The choice is yours.
Mierda! Jajajajaja!
Ah, disculpa! Yo no sabia muchacha, yo no tengo problema!
Oh orale. Venga venga vamos a jugar!
Why are they doing this to us? Starbucks isn't even that good. I’m barely able to afford milk for my kids.
Man, these people are always coming in here and messing things up, why can’t they just go somewhere else. Gentrification is so unfair! How are we going to afford a regular living. Mis hijos!
Ey we don’t want you people coming into our place and trying to push us out!
Yeah this was happening last week too, the store across the street was closed down and they opened up a wine and spirits store. Now there's a whole bunch of gringos in there.
Don’t you dumb kids know about gentrification?! That gets people like us kicked out but we've lived here long!
Yo, What you want from me blood?
I'm just out here trying to survive.
Out of all the people who you can be bothering tonight you come and bother me and for what?!
No! My mixtape!
Man, Fuck this, I just got thrown out the club, profiled by a cop and I can’t take this shit no more. I'm done with life man.

Listen You don't know what I've been through, my life feels like shit because of people like you, forcing me out of my neighborhood and I thought my musical talent was going to take me all the way and move me out the hood. But Kanye, J Cole and the light skin dude of Drake, Chris Brown and The Weeknd became popular but...but I know that I had the greatest mixtape of 2010! Hands down blood, hands down!

I have a copy of that tape that includes this fire track, so fire that he'll burn the block down, that the fire department will have to be present and put it out. The tape was called "Make loose dollaz change again".
Don’t come running in when I blow up. They going to be begging me for a new tape.
Oh thank you Diana for your help, my name is Jo.
Fuck this shit, I just got thrown out the club and profiled by these dirty pigs
I'm not gonna be able to stay in my neighborhood cause of people like you.
I've been grinding for a while and I thought my musical talent was going to get me out first.
The light skin gang of Drake, Chris Brown and The Weeknd were stealing all my fans when I know I had the greatest mixtape of 2010 bra, I promise you.
I hope so but thank you in advance.
Since you're here you should check out this fire off my mixtape called "Make loose change dollaz again".
Trust me this will make the fire department arrive immediately.
Don’t think you getting any shine off my name when I’m cashing in these checks and I'm shitting on these guys, man.
My name is Jo by the way.
"Make loose dollaz change again".
Fuck this shit, I just got thrown out the club and profiled by these dirty pigs.

Your people led me to the streets, I do not deserve this. “Make loose dollaz change again” could've been the hit of 2010, but they wasted great talent for artists such as the master of mood swings, Kayne. The reason you're drinking your glass of tears instead of water, aka Drake and the reason you have two baby mamas you can't remember how you met them, aka The Weeknd.
Hey, watch where the hell you’re going!
Don’t be sorry, be careful!
Who do you think you talking to, do you know who I am? I’m Johnny Fuego.
I could buy you and this whole bar, all cash no swipe!
I outta-
Whatever, I don’t have time for this!
Wow, you guys sure know how to make an entrance. Everyone knows when the sweetspot crew is in the building.
I mean, we were 18 back then. I'm 28 years old now, I assumed we would've gotten over this in 10 years. But hey that's just me I guess.
Touche, can I get you a drink?
Still trying to charm your way to free things I see.
Okay boss lady you got it! Although I always pictured you as more of a Henny type of girl though
What? Did you end up having an epiphany or something during these 10 years?
What’s a chopped cheese?
What's "putting on"?
Wow! That actually does sound pretty good, but I'm not gonna hold you for any longer. Now that I work at your favorite spot, don't be a stranger.
Oh we have another one in here trying to take over our last spot. Why doesn't she just go somewhere else?
Yeh! You gringos coming in here and push us out, we're not having any of that today!
If you are looking for a job and you enjoy seeing a smile on a customer's face then you should apply for a job at Mex-grill. At Mex-grill you will serve 100% organic mexican dishes.

I am here at the scene where a man was approached by two police officers. We go now to footage of this incident. This is an area where the issue of gentrification is on many people's minds. The topic of gentrification is of serious concern to many people in the community.
